title: The Runaway
description: Roger has to babysit Dee, so he can't go to a party.

title: The Birthday Present
description: Roger plays dice to buy his mama a birthday present.

title: When Daddy Comes Marching Home
description: Roger and Dee's dad comes to visit.

title: My Three Tons
description: Rerun auditions for the Rockets.

title: Saturday's Hero
description: Rerun on football team will be cut unless gets A, Roger writes his speech for him.

title: The Burger Queen
description: Rerun tries out for hamburger commercial, but they want Dee.

title: Shirley's Date
description: Raj goes to a dating service to get a date for Shirley.

title: Christmas
description: Mama finally gets off for Christmas, but the kids daddy made plans for them to be with him

title: The Maid Did It
description: Mama gets fired cause a ring is missing from her employer.

title: The Hospital Stay
description: Roger in hospital for knee surgery, Dee makes friends with the old man in the next bed.

title: The Firing Squad
description: Shirley gets fired from Rob's.

title: The Boarder
description: The Thomas' need extra money so decide to take in a boarder, its their dad who acts like he needs a place to live so he can give them money.

title: Dwayne's Dilemma
description: Dwayne's new girlfriend has a jealous ex, who wants to fight Dwayne.

title: The Tickets
description: Mama gives Roger two tickets to Stevie Wonder concert, he can't decide which friend to take.

title: What's Wrong with Raj?
description: Dee is always snooping in Raj's journal so they play trick on her that Raj is really sick.

title: Nice Guys Finish Last
description: Dee's pen pal who just got out prison comes and stays with them.

title: From Here to Maternity
description: Shirley's sister comes for a visit.

title: Raj Goes to Press
description: His ego hurt when his articles are not published in the school newspaper, Roger recruits Dwayne and Rerun to help him publish an underground newspaper. The experience soon becomes an important lesson in the First Amendment when they expose their no-nonsense English teacher's plans for a pop quiz and publish unflattering remarks about the principal. Roger refuses to reveal how he learned about the "surprise test" (his buddies had peeked in her desk and saw it by accident, something the teacher eventually catches on to) and is threatened with expulsion.

title: Nothing Personal
description: Shirley is offered a clerical position with a balloon distribution company. She becomes angry when she discovers was only hired to be a "token" African-American employee.

title: If I'm Elected
description: Dwayne's father, Lawrence Nelson, is running for city council. Dwayne is really proud of his father ... until one afternoon at campaign headquarters, he accidentally overhears him firing one of his campaign workers (Ted, a longtime friend of the family) and telling him to pack his stuff up and get out, because "we don't need that kind of stuff in our campaign." Dwayne's pride turns to shame and he goes to Mama Thomas to sort out his problems, but of it turns out Dwayne only knows part of the story - Ted was fired for theft of campaign funds.

title: The Play's the Big Thing
description: Roger risks the success of his play by casting Rerun in the lead.

title: Give Me Odds
description: Rerun figures he has a sure-fire system for beating the football pool.

title: Bill Gets Married
description: Dee has a hard time accepting her father's decision to remarry.

title: Mama, the School Girl
description: A middle-aged dunce in Mama's high-school class lets her believe he likes her so she will do his assignments.

title: One Strike and You're Out
description: Raj wants to go on Strike at work, then changes his mind when he finds out his Mama is out of work.

title: The Testimonial
description: Raj, Rerun, & Dwayne give their teacher Mrs. Collins a gift, an empty box, but then feel guilty.

title: Black and White Blues
description: Roger, Rerun, & Dwayne borrow the church raffle's grand prize color TV set and then drop it.

title: Going, Going, Gong
description: Raj and Dee help a young singing group get on "The Gong Show", Rerun auditions too and makes it.

title: Dee's First Date
description: Roger couldn't be happier about Dee's first date, the boyfriend has a gorgeous sister.

title: Doobie or Not Doobie: Part 1
description: Raj, Rerun, & Dwayne are desperate to see the Doobie Brothers in concert. Rerun gets roped into illegally recording the concert.

title: Doobie or Not Doobie: Part 2
description: A bully makes the boys put together a tape of the Doobie Brothers concert.

title: Rerun Sees the Light
description: A con artist persuades Rerun to shave his head and dedicate his life and money to a cult.

title: Raj and the Older Woman
description: Roger tries to impress an older girl by pretending to be an experienced actor.

title: Diplomatic Immunity
description: A hit and run driver dents the car that Rerun "borrowed" from his brother-in-law.

title: Shirley Is a Mother
description: Shirley plays mother to Roger and Dee when Mama visits a relative in Phoenix.

title: The Apartment
description: Roger and Rerun get their own apartment, and Mama keeps coming over.

title: Disco Dollar Disaster
description: Rerun sees easy money in a disco contest, if he can raise the $25 entry fee.

title: Shirley's Boyfriend
description: The boys introduce Shirley to a friend of Roger's father.

title: Basketball Brain
description: Roger is hired to tutor a basketball player trying to qualify for a college scholarship.

title: The Creep Detective
description: A police detective holds Roger, Rerun, & Dwayne on burglary charges.

title: Shirley's Cookies
description: A swindler tries to exploit Shirley's cookie recipe.

title: The Landlady
description: Roger tries to impress his landlady after he misinterprets her kindness as a come-on.

title: Charge
description: Rerun goes on a spending spree with his new credit card.

title: Raj Moves Out
description: Roger decides to move in with a sophisticated college coed.

title: No Clothes Make the Man
description: Desperate for money, Roger searches frantically for a job.

title: Positive Identification
description: Roger and Rerun have their Christmas spirit dampened when their apartment is robbed.

title: Making Out
description: Roger and Rerun think putting on airs will win a girl's heart

title: Dee, the Cheerleader
description: Dee begins an intensive training program to make the cheerleading squad.

title: A Present for Dee
description: Dee is surprised with a party, and a stolen necklace on her birthday.

title: Dwayne's Dream
description: Dwayne considers quitting school to hawk peanuts at sporting events.

title: Shirley's Fired
description: When Shirley complains that she is overworked, Rob decides to hire a second waitress.

title: Food Poisoning
description: Convinced he was poisoned by a burger at Rob's shop, Rerun decides to sue.

title: The Eviction
description: Roger and Rerun demand that their landlord help pay for repairs on their decaying apartment.

title: The Thomas Treasure
description: Roger accidentally learns that a small fortune stolen by a mobster may be hidden in his mother's house.
